title: Microsoft SDE2 - L61 - Hyderabad
content:
Education: M.Tech tier 1
Years of Experience: 3
Date of the Offer: July 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: L61
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: ₹30L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: ₹5L (3 + 2)
Stock bonus: ₹70K USD over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30 (base) + 14 (stocks) + 3 (10% bonus) = 47L

Prev comp: 38L fixed + 6L variable (Joined only one month before, previously 28L+3L)

Base seems less, should I negotiate?
